text: Dmitry Arkadyevich Volkov (30 March 1966 â€“ 16 January 2025) was a Russian Olympic breaststroke swimmer. He swam at the 1988 and 1992 Olympics. He won two bronze medals at the 1988 Olympics. Volkov was born in Moscow, Russia. Volkov died in Moscow on 16 January 2025 from cancer at the age of 58. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Russia Category:Swimmers Category:Sportspeople from Moscow Category:Cancer deaths in Russia
title: Dmitry Volkov (swimmer)
